did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: St. John's Episcopal Church of Phelps records, 1833-1903.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: St. John's Episcopal Church of Phelps (Phelps, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Vestry meeting minutes and vestry and annual church meeting minutes. Parish register containing a church history, record of families, baptisms, confirmations and communicants.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Vestry meeting minutes (1833-1886) and vestry and annual church meeting minutes (1832-1903). Parish register containing a church history, record of families, baptisms, confirmations and communicants.
